db:abstract.db:para: The QLowEnergyCharacteristicData class is used to set up GATT service data.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: An Object of this class provides a characteristic to be added to a QLowEnergyServiceData object via QLowEnergyServiceData::addCharacteristic().

db:section.db:title: QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::QLowEnergyCharacteristicData()
db:section.db:para: Creates a new invalid object of this class.

db:section.db:title: QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::QLowEnergyCharacteristicData(const QLowEnergyCharacteristicData &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new object of this class that is a copy of other.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::~QLowEnergyCharacteristicData()
db:section.db:para: Destroys this object.

db:section.db:title: void QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::addDescriptor(const QLowEnergyDescriptorData &descriptor)
db:section.db:para: Adds descriptor to the list of descriptors of this characteristic, if it is valid.

db:section.db:title: QList<QLowEnergyDescriptorData> QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::descriptors() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the descriptors of this characteristic.

db:section.db:title: bool QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::isValid() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if and only if this characteristic is valid, that is, it has a non-null UUID.

db:section.db:title: int QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::maximumValueLength() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum length in bytes that the value of this characteristic can have. By default, there is no limit beyond the constraints of the data type.

db:section.db:title: int QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::minimumValueLength() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the minimum length in bytes that the value of this characteristic can have. The default is zero.

db:section.db:title: QLowEnergyCharacteristic::PropertyTypes QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::properties() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the properties of this characteristic.

db:section.db:title: QBluetooth::AttAccessConstraints QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::readConstraints() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the constraints needed for a client to read the value of this characteristic. If properties() does not include QLowEnergyCharacteristic::Read, this value is irrelevant. By default, there are no read constraints.

db:section.db:title: void QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::setDescriptors(const QList<QLowEnergyDescriptorData> &descriptors)
db:section.db:para: Sets the descriptors of this characteristic to descriptors. Only valid descriptors are considered.

db:section.db:title: void QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::setProperties(QLowEnergyCharacteristic::PropertyTypes properties)
db:section.db:para: Sets the properties of this characteristic to properties.

db:section.db:title: void QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::setReadConstraints(QBluetooth::AttAccessConstraints constraints)
db:section.db:para: Specifies that clients need to fulfill constraints to read the value of this characteristic.

db:section.db:title: void QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::setUuid(const QBluetoothUuid &uuid)
db:section.db:para: Sets the UUID of this characteristic to uuid.

db:section.db:title: void QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::setValue(const QByteArray &value)
db:section.db:para: Sets the value of this characteristic to value.

db:section.db:title: void QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::setValueLength(int minimum, int maximum)
db:section.db:para: Specifies minimum and maximum to be the smallest and largest length, respectively, that the value of this characteristic can have. The unit is bytes. If minimum and maximum are equal, the characteristic has a fixed-length value.

db:section.db:title: void QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::setWriteConstraints(QBluetooth::AttAccessConstraints constraints)
db:section.db:para: Specifies that clients need to fulfill constraints to write the value of this characteristic.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] void QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::swap(QLowEnergyCharacteristicData &other)
db:section.db:para: Swaps this object with other.

db:section.db:title: QBluetoothUuid QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::uuid() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the UUID of this characteristic.

db:section.db:title: QByteArray QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::value() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of this characteristic.

db:section.db:title: QBluetooth::AttAccessConstraints QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::writeConstraints() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the constraints needed for a client to write the value of this characteristic. If properties() does not include either of QLowEnergyCharacteristic::Write, QLowEnergyCharacteristic::WriteNoResponse and QLowEnergyCharacteristic::WriteSigned, this value is irrelevant. By default, there are no write constraints.

db:section.db:title: QLowEnergyCharacteristicData &QLowEnergyCharacteristicData::operator=(const QLowEnergyCharacteristicData &other)
db:section.db:para: Makes this object a copy of other and returns the new value of this object.
